title: FontStruct
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921143718/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921143718/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Software) : [Font Editors](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921143718/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Editors) : FontStruct**

In 2008 font retailer [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921143718/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop) released FontStruct, a free, online tool for the design, publishing and sharing of user created fonts.

The tool is limited to modular fonts.

[http://www.fontstruct.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921143718/http:/www.fontstruct.com/ "http://www.fontstruct.com")

See also: [tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921143718/http:/typophile.com/wiki/tools)
author: Joe Pemberton
